chapters.title: Prologue: Deceptive Appearances
chapters.info: King Paitar Nachiman, p. 18 (5)—King of Arafel, brother of Kiruna. His face is creased, though he was once stunningly handsome. He wears his gray hair cut short. His favorite granddaughter is married to Ethenielle's son. See also Nachiman, Kiruna; Nachiman, Menuki.
